title: [b]Move Art[/b]
desc:
Moves art file into a /finished/ folder after it has been used to render an image.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Hollow Mana[/b]
desc:
Use the outlined version of the mana symbols.
[b](Default: True)[/b]

title: [b]Borderless[/b]
desc:
Turns off the black border, and sets the art image to fill the card.
[b](Default: False)[/b]

title: [b]Side Pinlines[/b]
desc:
The pinlines to the left and right of the art frame. Sometimes I like the look of them still being there!
[b](Default: False)[/b]
